title: advanced stats.
body:
hi, im missing the old statistic board! 
that where u saw stuff like  total kills,damage,gold earned,minions killed, turrets destroyed, pentas,quadras,....and much more  for the whole season and previous seasons. will you patch that again ?

replies.body:
same opinion, but i dont think they will do it. You can go on Lolking or other sites which show you those statistics 
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
